attributes.action: Remove the VAT component on Veterinary Bills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The removal of Luxury Tax(VAT) for essential and/or paliative Veterinary Care to farmed or, enclosed animals, Pets and wild-life casualties in order to reduce the incidences of delayed and unmitigated suffering of innocent animals, and especially to rescue organisations increasingly burdened with ill and injured animals. 
A healthy pet generally promotes the health and well-being of its pet or, animal-owner
